name: Full Name *
transportationList0: Transporting all ADR hazard classes except 7
transportationList2: Over 20 years of experience with hazardous cargo
westernEuropeText: France, Belgium, Netherlands, Luxembourg, Germany, Austria, Switzerland
northernEuropeText: Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, United Kingdom, Iceland, Estonia, Lithuania, Latvia
southernEuropeText: Italy, Greece, Spain, Portugal, Croatia, Slovenia
easternEuropeText: Ukraine, Moldova, Romania, Bulgaria, Hungary, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland
balkansText: Albania, Serbia, Montenegro, Bosnia and Herzegovina, North Macedonia
why_choose_us_description: Many years of experience working with LLC 'AGROTEP' and consistently high-quality services form the foundation of leadership in the field of refrigerated transportation. This not only allows us to maintain our leading position but also continuously expand our circle of clients and partners. Our reliability and professionalism ensure confidence in further development and the achievement of new heights in this field.
agrotep_class_description: LLC "AGROTEP" provides high-quality and professional driver training in its own training class. Training is conducted according to approved programs, as well as under the "Code 95" program. The training class meets high standards of quality and safety, ensuring training at the highest level. Instructors in the training class have relevant professional experience and qualifications, providing drivers with both theoretical and practical knowledge and skills. We implement innovative training methods and use modern equipment to guarantee maximum quality and training efficiency.
gpsMonitoringTitle: GPS Monitoring: Control in Your Hands!
gpsMonitoringText: Ensure peace of mind and confidence in every delivery! AGROTEP vehicles are equipped with a modern satellite monitoring system that allows constant monitoring of the vehicle’s movement.
fuelTitle: Automobile Fuel: Quality and Environmental Responsibility
fuelText: Choose the best for nature and your transport! AGROTEP uses only the highest quality fuel from verified producers in Ukraine and Europe.
technicalConditionTitle: Technical Condition of Vehicles: Safety First
technicalConditionText: Trust your deliveries to professionals! AGROTEP provides high-quality maintenance and repair of commercial vehicles thanks to years of experience and modern equipment.
temperatureControlTitle: Temperature Control: Reliability at Every Step
temperatureControlText: Your cargo is in reliable hands! All AGROTEP vehicles are equipped with modern temperature recorders that guarantee accurate temperature control with the ability to print reports.
parkDescription: The park of AGROTEP LLC includes over 250 of the latest Euro 6 DAF and Mercedes-Benz tractors, as well as a corresponding number of modern and reliable refrigerated trailers from leading manufacturers Schmitz Cargo Bull and Carrier, known for their German quality and environmental leadership, made according to global quality standards.
historyData.1993: The foundation of 'Agrotep' as a small enterprise with a few vehicles. Entering international markets from the very beginning allows the company to provide fast and reliable logistics services for customers in Ukraine and Europe.
historyData.1997: Opening a dedicated repair zone with 12 repair sites, allowing technical maintenance and repairs of vehicles directly at the company's base, improving operational efficiency and ensuring high-quality services.
historyData.2005: Expanding the fleet to 100 vehicles, enabling 'Agrotep' to effectively serve the growing needs of clients. The company optimizes its logistics processes, enhancing efficiency and delivery speed.
historyData.2012: 'Agrotep' receives a license to transport goods of all danger classes, except radioactive (ADR 7), which opens up new opportunities for providing services.
historyData.2013: 'Agrotep' becomes one of the first operators to introduce new Euro-6 class DAF XF models on the Ukrainian market. These trucks offer significantly reduced fuel consumption and emissions, improving the environmental impact of transportation. The company begins equipping all trucks with GPS systems, enhancing delivery tracking and ensuring reliable transportation.
historyData.2015: 'Agrotep' invests in new trailers, including Double Deck trailers that can transport up to 66 pallets, as well as trailers with multi-functional capabilities. The company also implements trailers that combine both technologies — Double Deck with multi-functionality. This innovative solution ensures maximum flexibility and efficiency in transportation, strengthening 'Agrotep's position in the logistics services market.
historyData.2023: 'Agrotep' expands its fleet by purchasing new Mercedes-Benz and DAF Euro-6 class trucks that meet modern environmental standards. These vehicles feature advanced technologies, ensuring not only safety but also a reduced environmental impact, making transportation more eco-friendly and efficient.
sliderList.1.title: Agrotep and Ronald McDonald House Foundation in Ukraine
sliderList.1.text: The family room in the neonatal department of NDSC 'Okhmatdyt' operates thanks to the support of 'Agrotep'. For a year, the company has been helping families whose newborns are fighting for their lives by providing free accommodation. We are sincerely grateful to 'Agrotep' for their care and social responsibility.
sliderList.2.text: Agrotep LLC, as a member of the International Association of Road Hauliers of Ukraine (ASMAP), has access to the best solutions in the field of international logistics. We provide reliable freight transportation supported by European standards.
sliderList.3.text: Agrotep LLC, as a member of the International Association of Road Hauliers of Ukraine (ASMAP), has access to the best solutions in the field of international logistics. We provide reliable freight transportation supported by European standards, confirming our high professional level.
aboutUsDescription: Agrotep LLC is a leader in international refrigerated transport. We have been providing high-quality transportation services since 1993. For over 30 years, we have built a reputation as a stable and efficient partner. We provide transport services both for international and domestic routes. We are active members of ASMAP and the Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Ukraine. Partnering with leading insurance companies such as INGO, we guarantee the safety, reliability, and quality of every transport.
aboutUsInfoTitle: Today, Agrotep is a company with its own fleet of over 250 new trucks with Euro-6 or better environmental class
aboutUsInfoDescription: We remain the leader in international refrigerated transport in Ukraine. The company continues to provide high-quality logistics services and innovative solutions for its clients.
hero_title: The leader of international refrigerated transportation
history_text: "AGROTEP" LTD is a leader in regular freight transportation across Ukraine, the EU, and Asia countries since 1993. Continuous fleet renewal and the implementation of innovative logistics technologies ensure reliability and timely deliveries. We provide consistently high-quality services for our partners.
